title: Bitcoin price hits $105K as analysis eyes ‘massive’ Binance BTC withdrawals
summary: Bitcoin maintained its November pattern of higher lows as it rebounded to $105,000, but traders remained cautious about a potential rejection at key resistance.

title: Altcoins aren’t dead; long live altcoins
summary: Bitcoin won’t win as a monetary asset while tokens power adoption through incentive layers. Zero-knowledge transport layer security unlocks verifiable data portability.

title: Sonic Labs pivots from speed to survival with business-first strategy
summary: Sonic Labs’ strategic shift aims to bring “measurable, lasting value” for builders, validators and S token holders through upgraded fees, token burns and institutional partnerships.

title: Kraken co-CEO warns UK rules meant to protect users punish them: FT
summary: Arjun Sethi criticized the UK’s crypto regulations for burdening users with excessive disclaimers, saying they worsen customer experience.

title: Japan stablecoin issuers could fill central bank’s bond-buying gap: Report
summary: Japan’s first yen stablecoin issuer, JPYC, said growing demand could make stablecoin reserves a new force in the country’s bond market.

title: Bitcoin liquidity pattern signals ‘pivotal moment’ with $124K BTC target
summary: Increasing stablecoin supply mirrors past liquidity patterns that preceded significant Bitcoin rallies. Will BTC price return to $124,000 soon?

title: Bridge is a compliant crypto communication tool that ‘doesn’t suck’
summary: While Telegram and WhatsApp are fine for most retail users, institutions are held to higher standards when it comes to compliant messaging apps.

title: JPMorgan rolls out JPM Coin deposit token for instant payments on Base
summary: JPMorgan Chase has begun deploying its deposit token, JPM Coin, allowing institutional clients to make instant 24/7 transfers of US dollar deposits on Base.

title: Bitcoin ETFs roar back with $524M inflows in best day since market crash
summary: Smart money traders have also added $8.5 million worth of net long Bitcoin positions, signaling growing optimism among the industry’s most successful traders.

title: Arthur Hayes tells Zcash holders to withdraw from CEXs and ‘shield’ assets
summary: Hayes’ call to self-custody Zcash highlights renewed focus on privacy coins as the sector sees sharp price swings and mixed performances.
